Sentencas: Three solid oxide cells have been investigated after long-term high temperature electrolysis to explain the phenomena of accelerated degradation.
Titulo: Post-test analysis of electrode-supported solid oxide electrolyser cells

Sentencas: These cells contain a Ni-YSZ cermet (Ni-yttria-stabilised-zirconia) as hydrogen electrode (cathode), yttria-stabilised-zirconia (YSZ) as electrolyte, Ce0.8Gd0.2O1.9 (CGO) as diffusion barrier layer and La0.58Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3 (LSCF) as oxygen electrode (anode).
Titulo: Post-test analysis of electrode-supported solid oxide electrolyser cells

Sentencas: Cell 1, cell 2 and cell 3 were tested continuously at about 770 A degrees C, with a current density of -1
Titulo: Post-test analysis of electrode-supported solid oxide electrolyser cells

Sentencas: A cm(-2) and 80 % H2O of absolute humidity for 9000, 1770 and 1460 h, respectively.
Titulo: Post-test analysis of electrode-supported solid oxide electrolyser cells

Sentencas: It was found that in cell 1, the degradation rate was about 2.2 % per 1000 h, in cell 2 the degradation rate increased to 3.4 % per 1000 h and in cell 3 the degradation rate was 2.6 % per 1000 h.
Titulo: Post-test analysis of electrode-supported solid oxide electrolyser cells

Sentencas: The mode of cell degradation was also investigated as a function of the cell fabrication in the four layers system (anode/diffusion barrier layer/electrolyte/cathode).
Titulo: Post-test analysis of electrode-supported solid oxide electrolyser cells

Sentencas: An intergranular fractured surface along the grain boundaries of the electrolyte, and the formation of porous structures throughout the thickness of the electrolyte were observed in cell 1.
Titulo: Post-test analysis of electrode-supported solid oxide electrolyser cells

Sentencas: LSCF, as the oxygen electrode, showed compositional fluctuations with a changed perovskite composition and formation of cobalt oxide.
Titulo: Post-test analysis of electrode-supported solid oxide electrolyser cells

Sentencas: This phenomenon reduces the electrical conductivity and, probably, also the catalytic properties.
Titulo: Post-test analysis of electrode-supported solid oxide electrolyser cells

Sentencas: The hydrogen electrode did not show major changes in all the three cells tested.
Titulo: Post-test analysis of electrode-supported solid oxide electrolyser cells

Sentencas: Cells 2 and 3 showed similar features as observed for cell 1, except the fact that they retained the electrolyte structure without intergranular fracture and formation of porosity after continuous testing for long duration.
Titulo: Post-test analysis of electrode-supported solid oxide electrolyser cells
